articles.title: The scientist helping other scientists break through the 'big-data bottleneck' - Brisbane Times
articles.description: A UQ researcher has been awarded an international grant to continue his work into helping other scientists use the hugely complex microscopes used in experiments.
articles.content:
Dr Condon said actually operating complex microscopes is one focus of his work, while the other is being able to interpret the massive amounts of data which is generated by them.

articles.title: Is the iPhone 12 waterproof? We took it for a swim to test its water resistance - CNET
articles.description: Apple's iPhone 12 put up a good fight after being submerged in the chilly waters of Lake Tahoe.
